did.unittitle: Legislation - Bank Holding Companies Regulation - Demand by the Federal Reserve Board - Statement of the First National Bank Trustees - A.L.M. Wiggins, "Future Acquisitions by Bank Holding Companies across State Lines Should be Prohibited by Federal Law" - The American Banker, Article, Go-Ahead to Chain Bankers - S. 2577 - Committee for the Study of Revenue Bond Financing, Article, Glass-Steagall Banking Act
